Constructor Detail

FirehoseSpec

public FirehoseSpec(int listenerPortNum,
                    java.lang.String listenerHostName,
                    int dataType,
                    java.lang.String descriptor,
                    java.lang.String descriptor2,
                    int numGenCalls,
                    int numTLElts,
                    int rate,
                    boolean useStreamFormat,
                    boolean prettyPrint,
                    java.lang.String trace)
Initialize the firehose spec

Parameters:
listenerPortNum - The port number on which the firehose server is listening
listenerHostName - The host where the firehose server is running
dataType - Type of data to be generated, XMLB, Auction, etc.
descriptor - If stream type is file - descriptor is the name of the file to read. If stream type is gen - descriptor is the URI of the DTD to generate from
descriptor2 - An additional descriptor, right now used by auction to specify the type of auction data to generate
numGenCalls - Number of times to call the generator
numTLElts - Number of top level elements to be included in a document applicable to some data types - including XMLB and Auction
rate - The rate at which the stream should run - currently not used.
useStreamFormat - Should the firehose enclose the data using the niagara:stream formatting
prettyPrint - Include newlines or not??
